Appendix: Development Dependencies¶

General¶

  • boost-python
  • libjpeg
  • libtiff
  • libpng
  • fftw3
  • hdf5
  • Qt4
  • Vigra
  • VTK

Python¶

  • Python 2.7
  • PyQt4
  • argparse
  • numpy
  • h5py 2.1
  • psutil
  • greenlet
  • blist
  • wsgiref
  • qimage2ndarray
  • vigranumpy

Ilastik Sub-projects¶

  • lazyflow (with drtile)
  • volumina

Development¶

  • CMake
  • python-distribute

Testing¶

  • nosetests
